issue.title: [R] [Docs] Document py_to_r and r_to_py
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13442](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13442). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
